title: BlackHatCoiner
author: BlackHatCoiner
content: I'm searching for a high quality image of the popular The Times newspaper. The best one I've found is this: https://talkimg.com/images/2024/01/15/3fefd.png. Is there in higher quality? I was thinking of making a poster, like this one.

comments.author: Mia Chloe
comments.body: Wow that frame is very nice and gorgeous.Using that image is very ok but I recommend you make sure that those images don't have a copyright on them so you don't get into trouble.I'll probably update this post if I find an image with a better quality online.

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: Quote from: Mia Chloe on January 15, 2024, 07:04:48 PMWow that frame is very nice and gorgeous.This one is even more gorgeous! But... the price and delivery costs are not attractive. Plus, I want to make this myself.

comments.author: I_Anime
comments.body: Quote from: BlackHatCoiner on January 15, 2024, 07:11:25 PMQuote from: Mia Chloe on January 15, 2024, 07:04:48 PMWow that frame is very nice and gorgeous.This one is even more gorgeous! But... the price and delivery costs are not attractive. Plus, I want to make this myself.  this is the one I even came across while searching for higher quality. And it's actually pretty good still and think making it yourself will just  be the right thing to do.

comments.author: Mia Chloe
comments.body: Quote from: BlackHatCoiner on January 15, 2024, 07:11:25 PMQuote from: Mia Chloe on January 15, 2024, 07:04:48 PMWow that frame is very nice and gorgeous.This one is even more gorgeous! But... the price and delivery costs are not attractive. Plus, I want to make this myself. Whoa the price is quite huge I would say. Anyways Your choice is nice too but I seem to like the first one more.If you could be very resourceful in creating that frame I would say you go for it.I would love to see your finished job.Cheers

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: Quote from: Mia Chloe on January 15, 2024, 07:21:13 PMWhoa the price is quite huge I would say. Wait till you see the price of the actual newspaper!  It wouldn't surprise me if it isn't a scam site (even though I hold my doubts). The Times newspaper is probably the rarest Bitcoin collectible, probably rarer than cacascius coins.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: i think this https://talkimg.com/images/2024/01/15/3fefd.png is already enough and the news headline looks very recent. it says " Israel prepares to send tanks and troops into Gaza" dang! looks very coincidental. i also wanted to print this image. maybe it's going to spark conversation when people see the poster right in front of our store. just a question: is Bitcoin mentioned in the article and who paid for the publication?

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: BlackHatCoiner on January 15, 2024, 06:59:36 PMIs there in higher quality? I was thinking of making a poster, like this one. The quality of the image is good, at least some one can clearly read out the text written in small ink. Most of the "The Times newspaper" pictures I see online are usually blurry, and you will hardly be able to read anything. I could show you how bad it is if you want.If you think of making the frame yourself with the image, I think it will still look as good as the one that's sold on Etsy.com

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: The only idea I have on the matter is to try to use one of the free AI web tools on the internet and increase + enhance one of the freely available images likehttps://twitter.com/Cyvers_/status/1742467553618747579https://twitter.com/evymodeling/status/1370973067304898561/photo/1or the one from @electronicash' post

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on January 15, 2024, 07:36:27 PMor the one from @electronicash' post  Lol, the one posted by electronicash is exactly same image posted by BlackHatCoiner. Although, I think I get the Sarcasm.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: use reverse image search like tinEye and organise match list by "sort by biggest image"or go to the Times newspaper archive (subscription needed)

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: franky1 on January 15, 2024, 08:06:38 PMuse reverse image search like tinEye and organise match list by "sort by biggest image"or go to the Times newspaper archive (subscription needed)https://nft-arty.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/814bbyhj7zs.jpgthe biggesthttps://yandex.ru/images/search/?cbir_id=165367%2FAfM7WP9doRHHIhOfml2Vyw342&redircnt=1705400342.1&rpt=imageview&url=https%3A%2F%2Favatars.mds.yandex.net%2Fget-images-cbir%2F165367%2FAfM7WP9doRHHIhOfml2Vyw342%2Forig

comments.author: MusaMohamed
comments.body: The post from Coingecko on X looks to have good resolution. I used Google and customized with their search tool, try to find images with biggest size.

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: Quote from: BlackHatCoiner on January 15, 2024, 06:59:36 PMThe best one I've found is this: https://talkimg.com/images/2024/01/15/3fefd.png. This is the upscaled version of your image https://ibb.co/Sf4VDGL

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: Thanks to NeuroticFish for the AI idea and franky1 for this cool site!So, here I present... https://ibb.co/G2tyKz4! (19.4 MB)
